name: Madiba Bay School of Flight CC
about: Madiba Bay School of Flight, based in Port Elizabeth, South Africa, has been a reputable flight school since 2009. We utilize brand new Sling 2 aircraft for ab initio training and recently acquired a Piper Twin Comanche for advanced training. Our six full-time instructors ensure students progress efficiently, often completing their training from zero to Multi Engine Commercial with Instrument Rating in 9-12 months. We emphasize developing a pilot-in-command mindset and encourage independent thinking. Our students appreciate the freedom and family-like environment we provide. With a strong focus on quality training, we are proud of our students' excellent performance in licensing exams. Madiba Bay School of Flight is a happy and supportive place to pursue your aviation career.
